an6.21:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati samagamake pokkharaniyayam.
an6.21:1.2: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam pokkharaniyam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.21:2.4: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhamma bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti”ti.
an6.21:2.7: Atha kho sa devata “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an6.21:3.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.21:3.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam pokkharaniyam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, sa devata mam etadavoca:
an6.21:3.6: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhamma bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an6.21:3.8: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an6.21:3.9: Tesam vo, bhikkhave, alabha tesam dulladdham, ye vo devatapi jananti kusalehi dhammehi parihayamane.
an6.21:4.1: Aparepi, bhikkhave, tayo parihaniye dhamme desessami.
an6.21:4.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an6.21:4.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an6.21:4.7: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo parihaniya dhamma.
an6.21:5.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam parihayimsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihayimsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam parihayissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihayissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi parihayanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihayanti kusalehi dhammehi”ti.
